definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">The Tallneck has been made by a nearby Cauldron</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:Tallneck</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="spawn_entity"><field name="entity">CUSTOM:Strider</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="spawn_entity"><field name="entity">CUSTOM:Watcher</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="spawn_entity"><field name="entity">CUSTOM:Strider</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="spawn_entity"><field name="entity">CUSTOM:Watcher</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
